name: King of the Apocalypse
description:
Ever watched a zombie movie and thought: "pff thats easy, I would do it way better"?

Well look no further! Jump into the endless hordes of the apocalypse and compete against your friends! See who lasts the longest and can name themselves the true King of the Apocalypse!

Join our Discord server now! (link below) 

https://discord.gg/QcyBdUx
